name: Reflection Detection
description:
A game created for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme "It is not real"

------------------------------

A local club is having a vampire themed night and everyone is dressed up in their best costumes and dancing their way down the street! 

Including a few real vampires...

Figure out who's really a vampire and who isn't by carefully watching the reflections of the grooving crowd. Once you spot a dancing Dracula, take aim with a bottle of holy water and send them packing!

------------------------------

Controls:

Aim with mouse. Throw with left click.
